title: Should The Lakers Trade Stars This Offseason?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk about the idea of the Lakers’ trading LeBron James, if LA will go all in or all out going forward and what they expect from James Harden on the Sixers. Then, MacMahon reminds us who the best shooting big man of all-time is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Is It Time For The Lakers To Trade LeBron And AD This Offseason?
